name: Leechs of Sleep
description:
Play as a Dream Decay-er. Search houses to find active dreams to feast on. While feasting on dreams, enter the victim's dreams and discover their story. Then play as them in their dreams! 

(very early access) 

Known glitches:

 I didn't have time to fix it (the game works through the beginning to end): the helping hand will appear in the debris before the scooter kid hits it. If you can't pick it up. the scooter kid has to hit the debris. a window will open multiple times. this means you got the item.  just walk away. Press P to make sure you got the helping hand. if not go back to it. 

before you put the helping hand on the helping lift ladder. the dialog box doesn't exit as quickly as the other dialog boxes. keep hitting the space bar. it will go away. 

enjoy the game! follow me on https://www.facebook.com/Heart-Transplant-Art-Studios-344864833241700/
